ðŸ“– Summary: Calibre is a comprehensive e-book manager that allows users to view, convert, edit, and catalog e-books in various formats. It supports communication with e-book readers, fetches metadata from the internet, and can download and convert newspapers into e-books. Calibre is a cross-platform application available on Linux, Windows, and macOS.
